title: Disclosures in Scarlet
description: Disclosures in Scarlet displays the full power and range of America's foremost authors of imaginative fiction. A meticulous craftsman who writes with economy of prose style, Carl Jacobi offers here sixteen of his finest tales. They range in variety and mood from fantasy to the macabre, from chilling horror to the marvelous vistas opened by tomorrow's science. Often he creates his own unique blend that cannot be classified.
author: Carl Jacobi
